name: iCelebrate
overview:
iCelebrate is a unique reward program on Facebook that

  • Rewards users on birthdays by giving away gifts you like
  • Selects your favorite restaurants & invite you+friends to a free dinning
  • Gives you extra saving (4% and more) when you shop online
  • Tells you more about your friends, what they like and dislike about you and moreâ€¦

Birthdays Rewards Tell us what you like of the thousands of items we have in iCelebrateâ€¦ your preferences on items. We will randomly select items that youâ€™re interested and give you as a birthday present. At least for now, we wonâ€™t promise you a 600 HP Bentley Convertible or the $7000 purse for your birthday. But we will make sure to keep you happy!

Free weekly get-togethers Every weekend we randomly pick partner restaurant, a movie place, cafÃ© or an eventâ€¦ and invite 5-10 users who also happen to like that particular pick. You can go that particular weekend or any other weekend show your ID and enjoy a free meal, movie or other

Cash Back savings We share the commission we get from referring you to one of the 1500 online stores we are affiliated with. Itâ€™s the way other cash back service worksâ€¦ except iCelebrate gives 2/3 of the commission to you. One unique aspect of iCelebrate, you get to apply what you save to an already discounted service â€¦ restaurant, cruise line, event ticket etc. You get to pay $3 max on a $15 menu at your favorite restaurant..kind of deals =)

Know your friends With so many friends how well do you know each of your friends? Based on things that you like and dislike we can show you who has the most similar or least interest. You can also see topics you can chat or places you can hang-out together. Be on the â€œknowâ€!
